pageDescription: Tools to clear application cache and optimize performance.
permissionDenied: You do not have permission to access performance tools.

dexieCard.title: Application Data Cache (Dexie)
dexieCard.description: The application caches settings like appearance and menus in your browser's local database (IndexedDB/Dexie) to speed up loading. Clearing this cache forces the app to fetch the latest data from the server on the next load.
dexieCard.alertDescription: It will clear all locally cached settings (appearance, menus, etc.) for ALL users on this browser. Use it if you are experiencing data inconsistencies.

browserCacheCard.title: Browser Storage
browserCacheCard.description: Manage data stored directly in your browser's Local Storage and Session Storage.
browserCacheCard.appCacheDescription: Clear a specific cache key used by the application (''{cacheKey}''). This is a safe action.
browserCacheCard.localStorageAlertDescription: This will clear ALL data stored by this domain in Local Storage, including login sessions from other tabs.
browserCacheCard.sessionStorageAlertDescription: This will clear ALL data for the current session, which might cause unexpected behavior in other open tabs.

filesCacheCard.title: Browser Files Cache
filesCacheCard.description: To ensure you are seeing the latest version of the application files (like JavaScript and CSS), it's recommended to perform a hard refresh.
filesCacheCard.p1: This action clears files cached by your browser, forcing it to download the newest versions from the server.
filesCacheCard.p3: This is useful after a new version of the application has been deployed to ensure you are not running old code.

dexie.successDescription: All local data has been successfully deleted. Please reload the page.
dexie.errorDescription: Could not clear the application's local database.

appCache.successDescription: The specific key '{cacheKey}' has been removed from Local Storage.

localStorage.successDescription: All data from Local Storage for this domain has been removed. You may need to log in again.

sessionStorage.successDescription: All data for this session has been removed.

dexie.title: Confirm Cache Clearing
dexie.description: This will delete all locally cached data for the app, including appearance and menu settings. You will be logged out. Are you sure?

localStorage.title: Confirm Full Deletion
localStorage.description: You are about to delete ALL Local Storage data for this domain. This will log you out and may affect other open tabs. Proceed with caution.

sessionStorage.title: Confirm Session Deletion
sessionStorage.description: This will clear all data for the current browser session. This might cause unexpected behavior.
